vertical.description: [string]Animation variable to control the vertical angle.

horizontal.description: [string]Animation variable to control the horizontal angle.

turn_speed_vertical.description: Vertical turn speed in degrees per second.

turn_speed_horizontal.description: Horizontal turn speed in degrees per second.

ratio_exponent.description: How much the turret can move vertically dependent on the distance from horizontal. Formula: Vertical_Speed = pow(delta, -ratio_exponent). 0 is full speed always, 1 is only full speed when horizontal dist is low

vertical_limit_min.description: Vertical limit minimum, in degrees (-90 straight down, 90 straight up).

vertical_limit_max.description: Vertical limit maximum, in degrees (-90 straight down, 90 straight up).

horizontal_limit_min.description: Horizontal limit minimum, in degrees (-180 backwards counter clockwise, 180 backwards clockwise).

horizontal_limit_max.description: Horizontal limit maximum, in degrees (-180 backwards counter clockwise, 180 backwards clockwise).

trigger_rotation_sound_timer.description: Since rotation may jitter, we have a delay threshold for triggering the sound effect.

trigger_pitch_sound_timer.description: Since rotation may jitter, we have a delay threshold for triggering the sound effect.

rotation_start_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the turret starts rotating.

rotation_stop_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the turret stops rotating.

pitch_start_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the turret starts pitching.

pitch_stop_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the turret stops pitching.

warning_event.description: [string]Audio event that is being played on warning

pivot_node.description: [string]The node used for calculating the aim direction start point.
